title: Pls RIOT!!!!
body: Can i Get a free skin a blood yasuo skin pls i do anything for that

replies.body:
We can't give free skins like that. :/  I appreciate your enthusiasm though!  If you don't have them already, you can grab some other free skins through our current promotions:

- [Unchained Alistar](https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesInc)
- [Riot Girl Tristana](https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends)
- [Dreadknight Garen ](http://woobox.com/scrx56)

They have some solid Q spamming abilities, so give them a go.  :P  Hope that helps, hehe.
